definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="String" id="nombre">nombre</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_exists"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">nombre = guistate.containsKey("text:pet_name_input") &#10;            ? ((EditBox) guistate.get("text:pet_name_input")).getValue() &#10;            : "";</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="text_binary_ops"><value name="A"><block type="gui_get_text_textfield"><field name="textfield">pet_name_input</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">// Obtener el mob desde guistate (se guard√≥ al abrir la GUI)&#10;            Entity mob = (Entity) guistate.get("entity");&#10;            if (mob != null) {&#10;                // Guardar el nombre en NBT&#10;                mob.getPersistentData().putString("CustomPetName", nombre);&#10;                mob.setCustomName(Component.literal(nombre)); // Opcional: mostrar inmediatamente&#10;                mob.setCustomNameVisible(true);&#10;            }&#10;            if (entity instanceof Player _player)&#10;                _player.closeContainer();</field></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="entity_close_gui" x="647" y="200"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></xml>
